With the Galaxy J7, you have the freedom to choose the carrier and plan that work best for you.1 Take it anywhere you go, from Mexico to Canada, and still stay connected. Plus you can rest easy with Samsung’s standard U.S.limited warranty. It’s your smartphone. Own it on your terms. Screen Experience everything on a full, vibrant 5.5" HD Super AMOLED display. TV shows look bright. Words read clearly. And gaming is easier and more fun thanks to the large 5.5" touch screen. Camera Capture moments more clearly with the 8 MP main camera. Plus, take selfies that look great in any light with a 5 MP front-facing camera with flash. Battery A long-lasting 3,300mAh removable battery keeps you powered up to browse, read and listen wherever your phone takes you. Get up to 40 hours of talk time.¹ - Carrier Type Unlocked - Audio and Video Video Playing Format MP4,M4V,3GP,3G2,WMV,ASF,AVI,FLV,MKV,WEBM Video Playing Resolution FHD (1920 x 1080) @60fps Audio Playing Format MP3,M4A,3GA,AAC,OGG,OGA,WAV,WMA,AMR,AWB,FLAC,MID,MIDI,XMF,MXMF,IMY,RTTTL,RTX,OTA - Color Color Black - Display Resolution (Main Display) 1280 x 720 (HD) Main Display Size 5.5 " Technology (Main Display) TFT Color Depth (Main Display) 16M - Camera Video Recording Resolution FHD (1920 x 1080) @30fps Camera resolution (Front) CMOS 5 MP Camera resolution (Rear) 8 MP Digital Optical Zoom X4 (Digital) Features Auto,Continuous Shot,Panorama,Pro,Selfie,Sports,Sound & Shot Main Camera - Flash Yes Main Camera - Auto Focus Yes - Storage Internal Storage 16 Available Storage (GB) microSD up to 256GB (sold separately) - Network Frequencies and Data Type "GSM: 850,900,1800,1900 UMTS: B1(2100),B2(1900),B4(AWS),B5(850) 4G LTE: B1(2100),B2(1900),B3(1800),B4(AWS),B5(850),B7(2600),B12(700),B66(AWS-3)" - Connectivity Wi-Fi Connectivity 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac (2.4 GHz + 5 GHz) USB Micro USB (USB 2.0) Bluetooth® Bluetooth 4.1 ANT+ Yes Bluetooth Profiles A2DP,AVRCP,DI,HFP,HID,HOGP,HSP,MAP,OPP,PAN,PBAP Location Technology GPS,Glonass Earjack 3.5mm Stereo Wi-Fi Direct Yes PC Sync.
